title: Glad I had to sit in this game for 16 minutes for absolutely no reason.
body:
https://i.imgur.com/27ykB3R.png

Also glad that this player isn't going to get banned because he didn't type any bad words either.

Literally called me an idiot, said "have a nice 4v5" and left the game because he died while trying to gank my lane when I had no mana as a level 3 GP.
I'm honestly kinda done wasting my time with this game at this point, I work a 45-50 hours a week job just to get off work at midnight to have this shit in my ranked games lmao.

Honestly, if a player leaves the game before 15 minutes, there should be a 10 minute ff option that needs to be unanimously agreed upon, me right clicking around for 10 minutes so I don't get a leaver buster is kinda fucking ridiculous.
